summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of East 80th Street from 35th Avenue Northeast to the produced east boundary line of Balch's Wedgwood Park; of 36th Avenue Northeast, and 37th Avenue Northeast, each from East 80th Street as established herein to the south boundary line of Balch's Wedgwood Park; providing for the establishing of the curb grades of said street and avenues; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and for the making of the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon the property abutting on said street and avenues; and providing that the entire cost of such improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
